title: Home page Premium Services section id + Order Now smooth-scroll target update

requirements.summary: Change the Home page Premium Services section id to premium-services-old while keeping the exact heading text.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`, the section that renders the Premium Services cards has `id="premium-services-old"`.
The section still renders an `<h2>` with the exact text "Our Premium Services".

file_operations.description: Update the markup for the section that contains the "Our Premium Services" heading and the Premium Services cards so it uses the exact section id `premium-services-old` (replacing the current `services` id), while keeping the `<h2>` text exactly "Our Premium Services".

requirements.summary: Update the Home hero "Order Now" button smooth-scroll to target premium-services-old via scrollIntoView without scripts.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the "Order Now" button in the Home hero smoothly scrolls to the Premium Services section with `id="premium-services-old"`.
No new raw `<script>` tags are added to `frontend/index.html` to implement this behavior.

file_operations.description: Update the existing `scrollToServices` (or equivalent) click handler used by the Home hero "Order Now" button to locate `document.getElementById('premium-services-old')` and call `scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" })`, replacing the current `services` id reference, and implement this purely in React/TypeScript (no raw `<script>` tags).
